lead_paragraph: Connor McDavid tried to sneak one in off Semyon Varlamov in the second period, but the Colorado goalie was too quick.

headline.print_headline: McDavid Has 3 Points in 3rd as Oilers Beat Avalanche 6-3
headline.main: McDavid Has 3 Points in 3rd as Oilers Beat Avalanche 6-3
